title: 103_hr1079
content: Immigration Document Fraud Prevention Act of 1993 - Provides for: (1) the replacement of current green cards with new counterfeit-resistant identification cards for all permanent resident aliens eligible to work in the United States. (2) a national program to educate employers about their responsibilities under the Immigration and Nationality Act and the uses of such cards. And (3) a demonstration program to determine the feasibility of a computerized telephone worker verification system for employers. Increases immigration fraud penalties.
